alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Northern Washoe County; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 03 at 2:20PM PST until March 04 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 10 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. Wave heights on Pyramid Lake 2 to 4 feet. * WHERE...Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake, Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties, Surprise Valley California and Northern Washoe County. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 10 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust could limit visibility at times. Snow showers will also be possible through the day, with greater potential for snow to accumulate Saturday night.
info.instruction: Now is the time to secure loose outdoor items such as patio furniture, and trash cans before winds increase which could blow these items away. The best thing to do is prepare ahead of time by making sure you have extra food and water on hand, flashlights with spare batteries and/or candles in the event of a power outage.

area.areaDesc: Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Northern Washoe County; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
